name: Tetris: The Soviet Mind Game (GBC)
description:
Tetris: The Soviet mind Game is a homebrew software for the Nintendo Game Boy Color developed in C by Ry0G4_ using the GBDK (GameBoy Development Kit).

Controls:

  • START - start the game.
  • LEFT and RIGHT - move the pieces.
  • A and B - rotate the pieces

This game/software was in development between the 2014/11/10 - 2014/12/14 in my free-time.

In order to run this rom you need to use a Game Boy / Game Boy Color emulator.
